definitions: having distinctive attributes or aspects of a specified kind

examples.text: the front of the chassis is well featured
the complexities of a fully featured computer

shortDefinitions: having distinctive attributes or aspects of specified kind

definitions: having facial parts, such as the mouth, nose, and eyes, of a specified kind

examples.text: my aunt was a tall, hard-featured lady

shortDefinitions: having facial parts of specified kind

definitions: (of a newspaper or magazine article, broadcast program, or show) made a special attraction

examples.text: our featured interview for this issue
he was the featured guest artist
